import plus from './images/icon-plus.svg'; import minus from './images/icon-minus.svg'; const Comment = ({singleComment}) => { const imgSrc = './images/'+singleComment.user.image.png return (
{singleComment.score}
{singleComment.user.username} {singleComment.createdAt}
Reply

{singleComment.content}

) } export default Comment;
